mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NUM, PROD_NAME, PROD_EXPLAIN, PROD_SALE, PROD_PRICE, PROD_RECOMM, PROD_STOCK, PROD_CATEGORY, PROD_IN, PROD_OUT, PROD_INDATE, PROD_OUTDATE, PROD_MFR, PROD_CLIENT FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PROD_NUM DESC

SELECT PROD_NUM, PROD_NAME, PROD_EXPLAIN, PROD_SALE, PROD_PRICE, PROD_RECOMM, PROD_STOCK, PROD_CATEGORY, PROD_IN, PROD_OUT, PROD_INDATE, PROD_OUTDATE, PROD_MFR, PROD_CLIENT FROM PRODUCT WHERE PROD_CATEGORY = #{prod_category} ORDER BY PROD_NUM DESC

select b.rnum,b.prod_num,b.prod_name,b.prod_category from (select rownum as rnum, a.prod_num,a.prod_name,a.prod_category from (select prod_num, prod_name, prod_category from product order by prod_num desc)a where rownum <= #{pageEnd})b where b.rnum >= #{pageBegin}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT VALUES(PRODUCT_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prod_name}, #{prod_explain}, #{prod_sale}, #{prod_price},1, #{prod_stock}, #{prod_category}, #{prod_stock}, null, sysdate, null, #{prod_mfr}, #{prod_client})
